ref_item.label: THUNDERBEAT
ref_item.description: THUNDERBEAT energy device ( Olympus) will be used for dissection of tissue and ligation of vessels

pred_item.label: Group 1: THUNDERBEAT
pred_item.description: Patients undergoing laparoscopic left colectomy using the THUNDERBEAT energy device (Olympus, Japan). THUNDERBEAT is a multi-functional energy device which delivers both ultrasonic and bipolar energy, capable of coagulating blood vessels up to 7 mm, cutting and dissecting tissue.
interventionNames: Device: THUNDERBEAT 5 mm to 35 cm (Olympus, Japan)

ref_item.label: LIGASURE
ref_item.description: LIGASURE energy device will be used for dissection of tissue and ligation of vessels

pred_item.label: Group 2: LigaSure
pred_item.description: Patients undergoing laparoscopic left colectomy using the Maryland LigaSure energy device (Medtronic, USA). Maryland LigaSure is a bipolar electrosurgical device used for tissue dissection and vessel ligation.
interventionNames: Device: Maryland LigaSure 5 mm to 37 cm (Medtronic, USA)

pred_item.name: THUNDERBEAT 5 mm to 35 cm (Olympus, Japan)
pred_item.description: A multi-functional energy device which delivers both ultrasonic and bipolar energy simultaneously. Used for coagulating blood vessels up to 7 mm, cutting and dissecting omental and mesentery tissue during laparoscopic left colectomy. The device is provided sterile and intended for single use only. Generator settings were the same for all cases.

pred_item.name: Maryland LigaSure 5 mm to 37 cm (Medtronic, USA)
pred_item.description: A bipolar electrosurgical device used for tissue dissection and vessel ligation during laparoscopic left colectomy. The device consists of the LigaSure device and Generator-Force Triad. The device is provided sterile and intended for single use only.

ref_item.measure: Overall Time for Dissection of the Soft Tissues
ref_item.description: from the start of colon mobilization to specimen removal from the abdominal cavity

pred_item.description: Time to specimen removal measured in minutes from the start of colon mobilization to specimen removal from the abdominal cavity.

ref_item.description: Total/Composite score (composite of 5 variables:hemostasis;sealing;cutting;dissection;and tissue manipulation) was measured by a score system from 1 to 5 (1 being worst and 5 best) for each of the 5 variables,weighted by Coefficient of Importance with weight distribution as follow: hemostasis 0.275, sealing 0.275, cutting 0.2, dissection 0.15, and tissue Manipulation 0.1.). The final reported score is a weighted average.

pred_item.description: Composite of five variables (hemostasis, sealing, cutting, dissection, tissue manipulation) measured by a score system from 1 to 5 (1 worst, 5 best) for each of six specific surgical segments, adjusted/weighted by coefficient of importance (hemostasis 0.275, sealing 0.275, cutting 0.2, dissection 0.15, tissue manipulation 0.1). Mean score of 3.5 and above considered high versatility, below 3.5 considered low versatility.

ref_item.measure: Length of Post Surgical Stay in the Hospital
ref_item.description: Length of post surgical stay in the hospital measured in days
ref_item.timeFrame: from Surgery date to the discharge date from the hospital up to 30 days

pred_item.description: Length of hospital stay from admission to discharge measured in days.

ref_item.measure: Dryness of the Surgical Field Average Score Mean/sd
ref_item.description: Measured by score from 1 to 5 where 1 means Heavy bleeding , hemostasis achieved with the instrument with more than 2 attempts, and 5 means No oozing at vessel or tissue site in entire surgical field .

pred_item.description: Evaluation of the entire surgical field for overall oozing of blood or any other body fluids using a scoring system from 1 to 5 (5 = no oozing at vessel or tissue site, 1 = heavy bleeding requiring immediate intervention).

ref_item.measure: Intraoperative Complication Related to the Energy Devices
ref_item.description: Intraoperative adverse event occurrences during surgery due to the energy devices (THUNDERBEAT and LigaSure) measured as categorical variable "Yes" or "No"

pred_item.measure: Complications related to use of the instrument
pred_item.description: Number and type of intraoperative complications related to use of the energy device.

ref_item.measure: Delayed Thermal Injuries Related to Energy Devices
ref_item.description: Delayed thermal injuries related to Energy devices that occur after surgery within 30 days of the surgical date, measured as categorical variables "Yes" or "No".

pred_item.description: Number of patients with thermal injuries related to energy devices manifesting after surgery.

ref_item.description: operative procedure time measured in minutes from the start of the incision to the last stitch in the closure of the surgical incision

pred_item.measure: Failure of energy instruments to control bleeding
pred_item.description: Number of failures of the energy instruments to control bleeding during surgery.
